title: Animal Man, Vol. 3: Deus ex Machina
description: Written by Grant Morrison; Art by Chas Truog, Doug Hazlewood, Paris Cullins, Mark Farmer, and Steve Montano; Painted Cover by Brian Bolland This long-awaited third trade paperback completes the collection of Grant Morrison's legendary re-imagination of Animal Man. Reprinting ANIMAL MAN #18-26, DEUS EX MACHINA follows Buddy Baker through an incredible odyssey of discovery and features a new cover by renowned cover artist Brian Bolland.)
author: Grant Morrison
